about.details:
Incorporated in 2002, Amiable Logistics (India) Limited is in the business of providing services to importers and exporters for the smooth clearance of all kinds of imports and exports by air and sea as a clearing and forwarding agent and customs house broker. The company is a member of "The Brihanmumbai Custom House Agent's Association" popularly known as BCHAA or BCBA.

The company's services also include import-export consultancy, international freight forwarding, recovery of all types of claims including customs & insurance, warehousing, and transportation through air, road and sea.

The company provides a complete range of services like Freight Forwarding (Sea freight & Air freight), Customs Clearance, Warehousing, Transportation, Multimodal Transportation, loading/unloading of items to facilitate our customers with end-to-end solutions and other related value-added services.

The company cater its services mainly in the domestic market specifically in the state of Maharashtra.

Strengths:

  • Diversified revenue sources and customer base.
  • Modern Processes and Technology.
  • Team of professionals.
  • Smooth flow of operations.
  • Comprehensive solution for logistics requirement.
  • Customer oriented approach.
  • Infrastructural Strength.

faqs.question: What is the Amiable Logistics IPO?
faqs.answer:
Amiable Logistics IPO is a SME IPO of 539200 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹4.37 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹81 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on November 2, 2022, and closes on November 7, 2022.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Amiable Logistics IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Amiable Logistics IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Amiable Logistics IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Amiable Logistics IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Amiable Logistics IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Amiable Logistics IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Amiable Logistics IPO opens on November 2, 2022 and closes on November 7, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Amiable Logistics IPO?
faqs.answer: Amiable Logistics IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,29,600.

faqs.question: How to apply for Amiable Logistics IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Amiable Logistics IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Amiable Logistics IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Amiable Logistics IPO will be done on Friday, November 11, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, November 15, 2022. Check the Amiable Logistics IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Amiable Logistics IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Amiable Logistics IPO listing date is on Wednesday, November 16, 2022.
